Member Data Documentation

bool gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::debug

Debug messages enabled.

bool gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::constraintForced

Constraints equations enforced on each time slice.

string gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::dtdx

Courant factor dt/dx.

int gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::maxi

Maximum grid point index on base grid.

int gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::numPointsAboveMaxX

Number of "non-physical" points above maximum x.

int gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::maxLevel

The maximum refinement level.

int gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::refinementRatio

The refinement ratio.

GReal_t gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::errorTolerance

Error tolerance.

A mesh point needs refinement if error is larger than this value.

int gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::errorCheckFreq

Error checking frequency.

Numerical error is checked in every n-th step, where n is the specified value.

int gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::regridFreq

Regridding frequency.

Regridding always perform in every n-th step (or earlier), where n is the specified value.

bool gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::endless

Simulation never stops if enabled.

int gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::blankLines

Number of blank lines between two time slices in case of text output.

string gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::dataFormat

Data line format string in case of text output.

string gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::energyFormatStr

Energy format string in case of text output.

bool gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::energyWritten

Energy is saved if true.

bool gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::writeIntq

Write an intq file if enabled.

string gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::intqHeaderFormat

Format string for the header of the intq file.

string gridripper::amr1d::ParameterParser::intqFormat

Format string for the intq file.
